purpose: Local Adelaide sponsors for CourtLab Live Combines - Realistic tier structure

tierStructure.BRONZE: Local Adelaide shops, nutrition stores, small gyms ($500-1,500)
tierStructure.SILVER: Regional/growing brands, mid-size businesses, local physio chains ($1,500-4,000)
tierStructure.GOLD: Major Australian retailers, sports brands, larger companies ($4,000-10,000)
tierStructure.PLATINUM: Dream tier - Nike, Adidas, national chains (future)

sponsors.personalizationAnchor: Major Adelaide sporting goods retailer. Foot traffic + basketball equipment expertise. Perfect for athlete audience.
sponsors.activationBooth: Latest basketball shoes + apparel demo + "Best Athlete" merchandise voucher
sponsors.prizeCategory: Rebel Sport gift cards ($200-500 per category)
combineRoles: Category sponsor (Best Athlete, Best Shooter, etc.)
sponsors.draftedIntro:
Hi Rebel Sport,

Easter Classic 2026 (April 3-6) at The ARC: 300+ young basketball athletes + 600 families.

I'm Michael from CourtLab. We're running the event and need retail partners.

What you get:
• Activation booth for new shoe/apparel showcase
• "Best Athlete" award (your gift cards)
• Logo on all materials
• Direct athlete + family traffic
• Brand visibility with sports-focused market

Your Marion store location is perfect for reach. Interested?

courtlab.app

Cheers,
Michael
